item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in SureTriggers SureTriggers – Connect All Your Plugins, Apps, Tools & Automate Everything!.This issue affects SureTriggers – Connect All Your Plugins, Apps, Tools & Automate Everything!: from n/a through 1.0.23.
